q_ch: John 的订单全部生产完成了么？
q_en: Have all of John's orders been completed?
gt:
Hello there! 😄 Let's take a look at John's orders and see if they've all been completed.

Based on the information we have, here's a summary of the order statuses:

| Order ID | Total Quantity | Completed Quantity | Status        |
|----------|----------------|--------------------|---------------|
| 2        | 435            | 435                | Completed     |
| 10       | 150            | 0                  | Not Completed |

So, it seems that not all of John's orders have been completed. Order ID 2 is all done, but Order ID 10 still needs some work. If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask! 😊

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John';
steps.description: Retrieve the customer ID for the customer with the name "John"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM orders WHERE user_id = '2';
steps.description: Retrieve all order IDs for the customer "John"

steps.sql: SELECT order_id, SUM(number) as total_quantity FROM order_product WHERE order_id IN (2, 10) GROUP BY order_id;
steps.description: Retrieve the total quantity of products for each order

steps.sql: SELECT op.order_id, SUM(st.completed_number) as completed_quantity FROM sewing_tasks st JOIN order_product op ON st.order_product_id = op.id WHERE op.order_id IN (2, 10) GROUP BY op.order_id;
steps.description: Retrieve the total completed quantity of sewing tasks for each order

steps.sql: SELECT o.id, CASE WHEN completed_quantity >= total_quantity THEN 'Completed' ELSE 'Not Completed' END as status FROM (SELECT op.order_id, SUM(st.completed_number) as completed_quantity FROM sewing_tasks st JOIN order_product op ON st.order_product_id = op.id WHERE op.order_id IN (2, 10) GROUP BY op.order_id) as completed JOIN (SELECT order_id, SUM(number) as total_quantity FROM order_product WHERE order_id IN (2, 10) GROUP BY order_id) as total ON completed.order_id = total.order_id;
steps.description: Compare the total completed quantity with the total quantity for each order to determine if all orders are completed
